item.name: Create a new application to some of your preregistration's company.

request.name: Create a new application to some of your preregistration's company.

description.content:
As a partner company, you can create a new application to some of your companies.
The application should give access to our API to this companies, so they can use
it too.

response.name:
Our "idempotence output", if you get this HTTP code, it's an application
that already has been registered.

description.content: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey

response.name:
A new application has been registered. It'll be identified by the name that you give to it
and by the company that has been referenced.

every time you'll receive the same data from our endpoint.

A OpenPix  uma Plataforma de Gesto de Pagamentos. Para utilizar nossa API voc deve acessar  __[https://api.openpix.com.br/](https://api.openpix.com.br/)__ e somente o mesmo. A OpenPix no aceita subdominios para a API.
